nodes.text: Warralokk was a city on the planet Kashyyyk located in the Wawaatt Archipelago. During the Battle of Kashyyyk in the Clone Wars, the Wookiee Tarkov and his son Jaccoba discovered the Confederacy of Independent Systems invasion force. They warned the cities of the archipelago, but the cities, including Grunnrurr, soon fell to the droid invaders.
Warralokk was first mentioned in the now-defunct StarWars.com Databank entry for Tarkov, a character from the Star Wars: Clone Wars animated tv series.
